```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Import your librares as required
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(plotly)
library(RMySQL)
library(shiny)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r query_db_function}
# MySQL Settings
db_user <- "root"
db_name <- "fantasy_football_2019"
db_host <- "127.0.0.1"
db_port <- 3306
query_db <- function(query_string){
    con <- dbConnect(
        MySQL(),
        user = db_user,
        dbname = db_name,
        host = db_host,
        port = db_port
    )

    s <- query_string
    rs <- dbSendQuery(con, s)
    df <-  fetch(rs, n = -1)
    dbDisconnect(con)
    return(df)
}
```

```{r get_data}
player_history <- query_db("
    SELECT
        p.first_name,
        p.second_name,
        t.name AS team_name,
        p.element_type AS position,
        ph.* 
    FROM player_history ph
    LEFT JOIN players p
    ON
        ph.element = p.id
    LEFT JOIN teams t
    ON
        p.team = t.id
") %>% as.data.table
```

```{r clean_data}
# Construct full name
player_history[, full_name := paste(first_name, second_name)]

# Get net game score
player_history[, team_net_score := (team_h_score - team_a_score)*ifelse(was_home==1,1,-1)]

# Position as a factor
player_history[, position := factor(position, levels=c(1,2,3,4), labels=c("GK", "DF", "MF", "FW"))]

# Cumulative sums
cumsum_cols = c("total_points", "minutes", "goals_scored", "assists", "clean_sheets", "goals_conceded", "yellow_cards", "red_cards", "bonus")
cumsum_anscols = paste("cumulative", cumsum_cols, sep="_")
player_history[order(fixture), (cumsum_anscols) := cumsum(.SD), by=element, .SDcols=cumsum_cols]

# Lag columns
lag_cols = c("total_points")
lag_anscols = paste("lag", lag_cols, sep="_")
player_history[order(fixture), (lag_anscols) := shift(.SD, 1, type="lag"), by=element, .SDcols=lag_cols]
```

# Development plotter

```{r development_selectors}
unique_players <- unique.data.frame(player_history[, c("full_name", "team_name", "element")])
player_choices <- setNames(unique_players$element, paste(unique_players$full_name, "-", unique_players$team_name))

selectInput(
    "selected_players",
    "Select players",
    choices = player_choices,
    selected = c(11, 191, 210),
    multiple = TRUE
)

metric_cols <- c("total_points", "team_h_score", "team_a_score", "team_net_score", "minutes", "goals_scored", "assists", "clean_sheets", "goals_cnodeded",
                 "own_goals", "penalties_saved", "penalties_missed", "yellow_cards", "red_cards", "saves", "bonus", "bps", "influence", "creativity", 
                 "threat", "ict_index", "value", "transfers_balance", "selected", "transfers_in", "transfers_out")

selectInput(
    "selected_metric",
    "Select metric",
    choices = metric_cols,
    selected = "total_points",
    multiple = FALSE
)
```

```{r points_plot}
output$points_plot <- renderPlotly({
    req(input$selected_players)
    g <- ggplot(player_history[element %in% input$selected_players], aes_string(x="round", y=input$selected_metric, col="full_name")) +
        geom_line() +
        theme_bw() +
        labs(x="Game week", y="Total points", col="Name")
    ggplotly(g, dynamicTicks = TRUE)
})

plotlyOutput("points_plot")
```

# Scatter

```{r scatter_selectors}
sliderInput(
    "minutes_slider",
    label = "Minimum minutes played",
    min = 0,
    max = 90,
    value = 45,
    step = 1
)
```

```{r scatter_plot}
output$scatter_plot <- renderPlotly({
    g <- ggplot(player_history[minutes >= input$minutes_slider],
                aes(x=cumulative_minutes, y=cumulative_total_points, col=position, frame=round)) +
        geom_point(aes(text=sprintf("Player name: %s", full_name))) +
        theme_bw()

    ggplotly(g) %>%
    animation_opts(
        1000, easing = "elastic", redraw = FALSE
    )
})

plotlyOutput("scatter_plot")
```
